effect_entries.effect: Protects allies against moves that affect their mental state.
effect_entries.short_effect: Protects allies against moves that affect their mental state.

effect_entries.effect: Friendly Pokémon next to this Pokémon in double and triple battles each have a 30% chance of being cured of any major status ailment after each turn.
effect_entries.short_effect: Has a 30% chance of curing each adjacent ally of any major status ailment after each turn.
